title: Another Escalation in Yemen
sub_head: Biden tried to end the war with diplomacy. More violence followed.
body:
Something keeps happening in President Bidenâ€™s foreign policy: The White House announces that it wants to emphasize diplomacy on a particular issue, and American adversaries respond by advancing their interests with force. Consider the Iran-backed Houthi rebels in Yemen.
On Monday the group claimed responsibility for missile and drone attacks that left three people dead and six injured in the United Arab Emirates. The strike on Abu Dhabi was meant as retaliation after the U.A.E. stepped up its support for local forces fighting the Houthis. The attacks hit an oil facility, causing a spike in global oil prices.
